refnamediv.refpurpose: How a font should be rendered

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_t
refsect2.para: An opaque structure holding all options that are used when rendering fonts.

Individual features of a cairo_font_options_t can be set or accessed using functions named cairo_font_options_set_feature_name and cairo_font_options_get_feature_name, like cairo_font_options_set_antialias() and cairo_font_options_get_antialias().

New features may be added to a cairo_font_options_t in the future. For this reason, cairo_font_options_copy(), cairo_font_options_equal(), cairo_font_options_merge(), and cairo_font_options_hash() should be used to copy, check for equality, merge, or compute a hash value of cairo_font_options_t objects.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_create ()
refsect2.para: Allocates a new font options object with all options initialized to default values.

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated cairo_font_options_t. Free with cairo_font_options_destroy(). This function always returns a valid pointer; if memory cannot be allocated, then a special error object is returned where all operations on the object do nothing. You can check for this with cairo_font_options_status().

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_copy ()
refsect2.para: Allocates a new font options object copying the option values from original.

listitem.simpara: a newly allocated cairo_font_options_t. Free with cairo_font_options_destroy(). This function always returns a valid pointer; if memory cannot be allocated, then a special error object is returned where all operations on the object do nothing. You can check for this with cairo_font_options_status().

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_destroy ()
refsect2.para: Destroys a cairo_font_options_t object created with with cairo_font_options_create() or cairo_font_options_copy().

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_status ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether an error has previously occurred for this font options object

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_merge ()
refsect2.para: Merges non-default options from other into options, replacing existing values. This operation can be thought of as somewhat similar to compositing other onto options with the operation of CAIRO_OPERATION_OVER.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_hash ()
refsect2.para: Compute a hash for the font options object; this value will be useful when storing an object containing a cairo_font_options_t in a hash table.

listitem.simpara: the hash value for the font options object. The return value can be cast to a 32-bit type if a 32-bit hash value is needed.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_equal ()
refsect2.para: Compares two font options objects for equality.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if all fields of the two font options objects match

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_set_antialias ()
refsect2.para: Sets the antialiasing mode for the font options object. This specifies the type of antialiasing to do when rendering text.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_get_antialias ()
refsect2.para: Gets the antialiasing mode for the font options object.

refsect2.title: enum cairo_subpixel_order_t
refsect2.para: The subpixel order specifies the order of color elements within each pixel on the display device when rendering with an antialiasing mode of CAIRO_ANTIALIAS_SUBPIXEL.

listitem.simpara: Use the default subpixel order for for the target device
Subpixel elements are arranged horizontally with red at the left
Subpixel elements are arranged horizontally with blue at the left
Subpixel elements are arranged vertically with red at the top
Subpixel elements are arranged vertically with blue at the top

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_set_subpixel_order ()
refsect2.para: Sets the subpixel order for the font options object. The subpixel order specifies the order of color elements within each pixel on the display device when rendering with an antialiasing mode of CAIRO_ANTIALIAS_SUBPIXEL. See the documentation for cairo_subpixel_order_t for full details.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_get_subpixel_order ()
refsect2.para: Gets the subpixel order for the font options object. See the documentation for cairo_subpixel_order_t for full details.

listitem.simpara: the subpixel order for the font options object

refsect2.title: enum cairo_hint_style_t
refsect2.para: Specifies the type of hinting to do on font outlines. Hinting is the process of fitting outlines to the pixel grid in order to improve the appearance of the result. Since hinting outlines involves distorting them, it also reduces the faithfulness to the original outline shapes. Not all of the outline hinting styles are supported by all font backends.
New entries may be added in future versions.

listitem.simpara: Use the default hint style for for font backend and target device
Hint outlines slightly to improve contrast while retaining good fidelity to the original shapes.
Hint outlines with medium strength giving a compromise between fidelity to the original shapes and contrast

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_set_hint_style ()
refsect2.para: Sets the hint style for font outlines for the font options object. This controls whether to fit font outlines to the pixel grid, and if so, whether to optimize for fidelity or contrast. See the documentation for cairo_hint_style_t for full details.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_get_hint_style ()
refsect2.para: Gets the hint style for font outlines for the font options object. See the documentation for cairo_hint_style_t for full details.

listitem.simpara: the hint style for the font options object

refsect2.title: enum cairo_hint_metrics_t
refsect2.para: Specifies whether to hint font metrics; hinting font metrics means quantizing them so that they are integer values in device space. Doing this improves the consistency of letter and line spacing, however it also means that text will be laid out differently at different zoom factors.

listitem.simpara: Hint metrics in the default manner for the font backend and target device

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_set_hint_metrics ()
refsect2.para: Sets the metrics hinting mode for the font options object. This controls whether metrics are quantized to integer values in device units. See the documentation for cairo_hint_metrics_t for full details.

refsect2.title: cairo_font_options_get_hint_metrics ()
refsect2.para: Gets the metrics hinting mode for the font options object. See the documentation for cairo_hint_metrics_t for full details.

listitem.simpara: the metrics hinting mode for the font options object
